com.juraj.hdbs.querying.language.semantics

Class GlobalQuerySemanticChecker

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.juraj.hdbs.querying.language.semantics.GlobalQuerySemanticChecker

  • public class GlobalQuerySemanticChecker
extends java.lang.Object
    Contains methods for semantic evaluation of global queries
    Author:
    Juraj
